compatibility.notes: The NOSL license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions. However, care should be taken when integrating with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Comply with the terms of the license when distributing the Covered Code.
Ensure that any modifications are clearly stated.
license.name: NOSL
obligations: Include the license text in all copies or substantial portions of the Covered Code.
Include a copyright notice in all copies or substantial portions of the Covered Code.
State any changes made to the Covered Code.
